I bitched & moaned thru' my tough personal training session this morning, but OMG felt amazing after it!! Knee injury can't hold me back. ðŸ’ª

Goodness, my heart is racing - is this how runners feel when they submit an application to their dream race??! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ #ultragroupiedreams

@scottfergus1 @skooshmaccuish @Des_Tinney thanks guys, I'm getting my head in the game, pushed through a tough upper body gym sesh today! ðŸ’ª
Doctor told me today my knee recovery could take 3-4 months. Months! 2017 is shaping up to be no improvement on 2016's plantarfasciitis fun.
@pyllon @WHWRace I think you probably partially caused the problem yourself - you're training many of the new crop of hot ticket panellists!
@ruthmhowie Thanks Ruth. I'm feeling very low, but can't let this beat me. x x
@james_stewart13 aye, it's called 'projection', haha. Run, core work, stretches, FOOD. *laughs* x
Awesome read for keeping that #runmotivation going, for the non-injured among us all. But especially you marathonerâ€¦ https://t.co/K5LHtwe0p8
@james_stewart13 Twitter stops at "buying a..." I guessed "bacon roll", clicked the link, & was ashamed of my poor deductive reasoning! ;-)
Knee injury has resurfaced 6 weeks on after twinging something on Friday. Can hardly walk straight just now, & feeling beyond miserable. :-(
Loved the last episode of Series 4 of Sherlock - outstanding series!! As an ex-Heighington gal, always great to see @Markgatiss on TV. ;-)
@GlasgowOsteo tho that's Facebook I think
@GlasgowOsteo Tasty and Proper Tasty, maybe???
Oh aye, definitely no panic here. ðŸ˜ž https://t.co/LOOVV8foOa

Hitting the gym AFTER work is so much more difficult than getting up early for a pre-work session. But I survived!! #battleropesarestillevil
@purpleultrarun only on day 4, haha, I'm no expert yet. ðŸ˜‚ I've actually put a daily alarm on the iPad to tell me it's time to switch off!!
Only a few days into my new 8pm screen curfew, and it's going well. Reading/unwinding before bed, or prepping lunch for work the next day. ðŸ‘
Very muddy trail walk at Chatelherault today - hopefully not too long til I can run there again. Walked down steps,â€¦ https://t.co/pQlfjOhm99
@ultrabritton great race, absolutely gutted for him, so close!

Couldn't be any more true than this. x https://t.co/6jLHEGMYhW
Kicking off my 2017 blogging, with a wee update on goals etc. x https://t.co/V1iP6yP845
@dinasourgirl have a look at the pics and feedback etc. on the @BelieveIAm twitter feed. Think you'd like this. x x
Post-dinner is not the time to do my injury rehab work & stretching: I just lay on my mat on the floor & almost nodded off. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜´ #isitbedtime
@pyllon hahaha, I rang my parents to wish them HNY and my Dad sulkily muttered "they made me go out in the rain to knock to get back in". ðŸ˜‚
Volunteered at 2 chilly parkruns today: great fun, with plenty of friendly familiar faces & hugs. Home to hot soup. Great way to start 2017!
A round-up of my (non)running year & plans for moving forward. Can't WAIT to put 2016 behind me, I'll be honest. x https://t.co/moGbsUpNPU
Volunteering at both @scparkrun & @tollXparkrun tomorrow - start my race marshalling year off with friends & a lot of sweaty runner hugs! ðŸ˜‚
@rhinomittens look after yourself â¤ï¸ You have lots of people supporting you, available whenever you want to take the mask off & breathe. x
Shopping today, turning my back on the past week full of Christmas Beige Food. â¤ï¸ðŸ˜‚ #beigetastesniceâ€¦ https://t.co/hGIVAk1aqp
In the gym with my trainer this morning : "it's gonna be boring for a little while" - the truth of injury recovery. Feeling positive. x x
Back in Edinburgh, festive foodfest is OVER, knee recovery continues, back in the gym tomorrow: ready to smash 2017. Big plans for the year!
@james_stewart13 where's YOUR celebratory arms-in-the-air pic?! Claim your victory, don't let that wee cheeky lad take all the credit! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
With FOUR new obits (George Michael, Liz Smith, Richard Adams, Carrie Fisher) you can't argue 2016 has saved a wee horrid sting in the tale.
Went to see Rogue One for the 2nd time. Far better option that the hectic shops - especially since I've received a headcold for Christmas! ðŸ˜”
@james_stewart13 I've seen him interviewed on US tv before, it's scary how serious he is. ðŸ˜”
@J0hnCassidy yeah, but after 13 months of plantar fasciitis, started running again & sprained my knee! Lol, I've "rested" for 14 months now!
And to add insult to injury, today I've caught my sister's headcold!! #gettingirritable #sharingatChristmas
I've missed my Boxing Day run today, 2 yrs in a row due to injury (2 different injuries) - replacing it with lounging & eating is unhelpful!
@KathrynKHolden @james_stewart13 : if it helps me get running again, that's double-awesome. ðŸ‘ðŸ˜œ x x
@james_stewart13 I'm almost 40, lol, and still getting an education...! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ‘

Merry Christmas, everyone. ðŸŽ„â¤ï¸ Hope you all have a fabulous day with people you love, delicious food, and Santa has been kind! x x
@james_stewart13 oh no! I don't always open the blog link for your daily photos, do they always have similarly awesome bonus pics??! Dammit!
@skooshmaccuish - Backatcha, Skoosh. Have a brilliant Christmas. x x
Knee is ok climbing stairs, but sore if carrying a tray of tea while I do. My family isn't accepting this as an excuse, lol!! #rehabteahab
Stopped by #carlislecathedral today for a spot of calm from #christmaseveshopping - fresh air walk, before headingâ€¦ https://t.co/NVRK8FtLUq
Thinking about fitness goals for 2017, while eating a tonne of food. Not sure I'm doing this right. ðŸ˜‚ #festivefocus #fitat40 #injuryrehab
Visiting parents for Christmas; spent the morning doing the big food shop, & spending the afternoon napping. #christmaseveeve #holidayzzzz
@james_stewart13 haha, no home gym? No problem! #findingsolutions
@TheBodybuildgym some great cycle path loops for running if you go north of Ferry Rd (via Victoria Park) too. x
I KNOW there's tape in this flat somewhere. I know it! At LEAST 2 rolls. ðŸ™„ How come present-wrapping time is when iâ€¦ https://t.co/flhLxPShBb
Having delicious set-menu tapas at @CafeAndaluzDRG Edinburgh with work colleagues for our annual festive lunch.â€¦ https://t.co/kgMOOkzSRm
All the best to @CarolineRMckay running the West Highland Way (95 m) midwinter for charity, setting off tonight. Stay safe, Caroline, enjoy!
Met with my personal trainer today to talk injury recovery, plans for 2017, & adjusting my goals. Tough discussion, but positive thoughts! x
@pyllon loving following these updates!! And hey @jogiblin12 @LilacSwizzle looks like no frozen eyeballs yet, ladies! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ‘€ x
When lentil soup becomes a delicious high protein winter meal. @HeckFood #chickenitaliachipolatasâ€¦ https://t.co/GL1EzojHH1
Hahahahahaha. This might be one of my very favourites from this Twitter feed of Photoshop trolling awesomeness. x https://t.co/4oSWP4IzIk
Exactly 1 wk since knee sprain, recovery is going well. ðŸ‘ AND I've had no PF pain at all, tho' had ITB niggles. #strengthworkrequired #rehab
@james_stewart13 @pyllon - that's another telling sign of how ready your mindset was, no "wait til 1st Jan" nonsense for you! ðŸ‘ðŸ˜Š
Gettin' out of the flat today to go celebrate @SubversiveRun's birthday; still walking rather unsteadily, but knee-braced up & ready to go.
@TheBodybuildgym thank you!
@RobertOsfield probably a combination - not building quads, focussing on PF rehab too much, being overweight, trying to push speed, etc.
Exciting! Congrats all who made it through the @WHWRace ballot, commiserations to those who didn't. #westhighlandwayrace #ultraballotseason
@RobertOsfield @WHWRace yay, congrats. If all goes to plan, I'll be in Auburn that day, instead of KLL, but I'll be thinking if you all!
Hey, @pyllon, did you let your WSER100 pacer sign up for WHWR on the same day?! Poor planning, man! Haha. Brilliant news, @JohnConnolly77 !!
@RobertOsfield yes, it's the bottom of the quads & attached ligament that goes over the knee. Will strengthen quads when I can move again!!
@pyllon I agree with Des & your Mum: don't you understand how advent calendars work??? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜œx
Housebound & feeling sorry for myself. Knee pain is gone but the sprain means I can't put any weight thru it yet, so can't walk! #2016sucks
@RobertOsfield lucky! I've ended with a knee sprain that is going to take time to heal. Can't put weight through it without buckling. ðŸ˜ž
@karinsmiles thanks! Can't walk now, but pain is gone, just can't put weight through that leg without on buckling! ðŸ˜ž recovery is underway.
@ruthmhowie thanks. â¤ï¸ Struggling to put any weight through my knee and thus basically housebound, so ice packs and rest is my only option!
Knee buckled during today's run, hit the ground hard & ended up limping into A&E! Dr says it's a sprain, no serious damage. #ice&painkillers
Getting my headspace OUT of a miserable 2016 and ready for a much better and personally fulfilling 2017. Thinking goals & motivation. Yay!
Continued my route to recovery at fab @StAndsparkrun yesterday, and I'm off to the gym soon. Wish my returning fitness would return quicker!
@james_stewart13 Great video, but you totally get upstaged by Caelan. ðŸ˜‚ And a patch of sparkly grass on Croy Hill. x
@james_stewart13 it's EXCITING!!!!
Kicked off December with a slow run/walk along the seafront, got SO much to do, but this morning my soul is happy.â€¦ https://t.co/MyEp8yXwGh
Finished this morning's run at the local post depot, to collect my awesome @WeAreNation hoody & sleeves that made their way to Scotland. â¤ï¸
